content.rendered:
Welcome to All New

Pyromatic

Pyro

Bringing a Whole New Meaning to
HYPER Deflationary Tokens

Bringing a Whole New Meaning to HYPER Deflationary Tokens
DEXTOOLS
Pyro Swap

Total Supply Burned: 47%

0x1e2d230c7a7f4c679fb1378f1f51dedeae85cd72

ABOUT PYRO

ABOUT PYRO

$PYRO is a fast-burning hyper-deflationary token that gains value with every buy and sell transaction. The burns will be a true burn (and not a fake dead wallet burn) and actually remove the tokens from the total supply with every buy/sell transaction.

Since the initial supply of $PYRO is limited the floor price will continue to rise as more and more PYRO tokens are removed from circulation. Read More

The project has developed a burn bot for hire by other projects. If a developer or future project wants to have a guaranteed fully functional burner contract they will need to use our custom burns $PYRO contract with 2% going to $PYRO from all their future buy/sell transactions pushing the price of PYRO up even further alongside our burn bot with $PYRO ad-placements.

Whitepaper

PYRONOMICS

PYRONOMICS

There is a 7% Tax on every Buy/Sell Transaction
There is a 7% Tax on every Buy/Sell Transaction
1% Reward LP for Staking

1% tax will be deducted and added to staking rewards to keep the staking pool healthy.

1% Development

1% of each transaction will be added into development funds to keep pushing the project

5% True Burns

$PYRO will burn 5% of all $PYRO from both buys and sells increasing the value of each $PYRO token, and continually raising the floor price.

$PYRO Slippage: Set slippage at 8-15% (so no MEV bots can sandwich you)
0x1e2d230c7a7f4c679fb1378f1f51dedeae85cd72
Buy Now

More Hype More Pump More Burns!

PURE TRUE BURNS

$PYRO STAKING

$PYRO STAKING

$PYRO is a fast-burning hyper-deflationary token that gains value with every buy and sell transaction. The burns will be a true burn (and not a fake dead wallet burn) and actually remove the tokens from the total supply with every buy/sell transaction.

Pyro has launched Staking as an utility for their loyal investors. Just stake your $PYRO tokens to earn more $PYRO

  • APR: 33%
  • Deposit fee: 5.75% of your holding that are to be staked
  • Min lock period: 30 days
  • Early withdrawal Penalty: 50%
  • APR and Staking Deposit % are variable and subject to change*
$PYRO Staking

$PYRO SWAP

$PYRO SWAP

$PYRO is proud to bring you $pyro Swap, keeping on their roadmap bringing the community another utility. Now you can swap any token from 20+ chains with less gas fees right on our Pyro Swap

  • Best price across 120 Dexes
  • Cross chain swaps
  • Cheaper gas than uniswap
  • 20+ chains supported
  • zero restrictions: no country, IP, or token bans ever
  • Ape Mode – sets slippage high enough to get in on launches
  • Automatic slippage detection
  • Automatic rug/sell checker
$PYRO Swap

$PYRO BURN BOT

$PYRO BURN BOT

If you have been in the DEFI space over the past few months you have seen bots like “bobby buy bot” and “bubble buy bot” flooding Telegram chats when buys come into the project. These bots do a great job of creating hype within the community and keeping the investors engaged. We plan to enter this space with a complementary bot that will help go alongside the buy bots within the telegram chats and multiply the hype and engagement even more…

Instead of a buy bot, we have introduced a burn bot PYRO-bot, that will show how many tokens are burned with every transaction as they happen one by one. Think about how this could keep strong engagement, and build communities in this space. Read More

These bot posts are easily shareable amongst communities, and it will keep people aware of just how valuable, and scarce these tokens will become over time!

The utility doesn’t stop with the burn bot… We plan to heat it up with another utility that could benefit other projects as well along the way, so stay tuned for that announcement…

View Bot in Action

NFT

NFT

Exclusive $PYRO NFTS for diamond hand $PYRO holders

BUY NFT

WE ARE PYRO

WE ARE PYRO

YOU WONT FIND ANY REASON TO NOT LOVE US.

  • Telegram Burn Bot
  • 100% of taxes to burns
  • No Team Tokens
  • Liquidity Locked
  • Huge Marketing
  • Diamond hand NFT’s
  • Real Use Case
  • Community Focused
$PYRO LinkTree

ROADMAP

ROADMAP

Phase 1
  • Social Media Setup
  • PYRO Launch
  • PYRO Burn Bot
  • Utility Reveal
  • Partnerships
Phase 2
  • New Website
  • Pyromatic Staking Platform
  • CMC and GC Listings
  • Pyro Branding Upgrade
  • Marketing Blitz
Phase 3
  • PyroSwap Platform
  • NFTs to Holders
  • Exchange and Swap Listings
  • Enhanced Utilities / Marketing
  • Future Road Map Development

How to buy

HOW TO BUY

Step 1

Download & setup MetaMask or TrustWallet

Step 2

Buy & send ETH to Metamask or Trust wallet

Step 3

Head over to Pyro Swap to buy your $PYRO

Step 3

View $PYRO in your wallet and lastly HODL

VIDEO TUTORIAL
Contact us at: admin@pyrotokenerc.com

© 2022 Powered by PYRO

Website designed by iCryptomate

Pyromatic also does not promise financial gain, its goal is to provide an investment while accruing income to further the project and reward its users of the platforms.
